serviceDescription.title: 1. Service Description and User Eligibility
serviceDescription.description: periodhub.health is a health education platform that provides menstrual health information, educational resources, and interactive tools. Our services are designed to help users better understand and manage menstrual health.
serviceDescription.serviceScope: Our services include but are not limited to:
serviceList: Menstrual health education articles and guides

userEligibility.title: User Eligibility
userEligibility.ageRequirement: You must be at least 13 years old to use our services. Users under 18 should use our services under parental guidance.
userEligibility.capacity: You must have the legal capacity to enter into binding agreements.
userEligibility.accuracy: You agree to provide accurate and complete information when using our services.
